_sText:
This map is not good.
This map is not serious.
This map is a joke.

Ah, bhop_bepis, this map is a tumor on the back of the beautiful fruit called the banana, and now it's here to stay. After a run in with the forgotten tenures in the end, this cancer is back and worse than ever. This map was made to be a joke and should be taken in no way seriously. This map is possible though, if you watch the video above, you will see me doing the map in 1:36, which is definitely improvable, but I wanted to get a "walk-through" out. This map took about 6 hours to make, across two days.

PART II OUT NOW!!!

Re-Uploaded November 6, 2016.
Updated description November 6, 2017.
